description: Tests the functionality of repository triggers by sending information to the trigger target. If real data is available in the repository, the test sends data from the last commit. If no data is available, sample data is generated.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository in which to test the triggers.

parameters.name: triggers
parameters.description: The list of triggers to test. (dict) --- Information about a trigger for a repository. The name of the trigger. The ARN of the resource that is the target for a trigger (for example, the ARN of a topic in Amazon SNS). customData (string) --- Any custom data associated with the trigger to be included in the information sent to the target of the trigger. branches (list) --- The branches to be included in the trigger configuration. If you specify an empty array, the trigger applies to all branches. (string) --- The repository events that cause the trigger to run actions in another service, such as sending a notification through Amazon SNS. (string) ---

nested_params.name: destinationArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the resource that is the target for a trigger (for example, the ARN of a topic in Amazon SNS).

nested_params.name: customData
nested_params.description: Any custom data associated with the trigger to be included in the information sent to the target of the trigger.

nested_params.name: branches
nested_params.description: The branches to be included in the trigger configuration. If you specify an empty array, the trigger applies to all branches.

nested_params.name: events
nested_params.description: The repository events that cause the trigger to run actions in another service, such as sending a notification through Amazon SNS.

nested_items.name: successfulExecutions
nested_items.description: The list of triggers that were successfully tested. This list provides the names of the triggers that were successfully tested, separated by commas.

nested_items.name: failedExecutions
nested_items.description: The list of triggers that were not tested. This list provides the names of the triggers that could not be tested, separated by commas.

nested_items.name: trigger
nested_items.description: The name of the trigger that did not run.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: Message information about the trigger that did not run.
